solution_line_template: Since a year has {days_in_year} days, the total television production in the first year is {production_rate_per_day}*{days_in_year} = <<{production_rate_per_day}*{days_in_year}={total_production_first_year}>>{total_production_first_year}

In the second year, they reduced the total television production by {reduction_percentage}*{total_production_first_year} = <<{reduction_percentage}*{total_production_first_year}={reduction_amount}>>{reduction_amount}

The total television production in the second year was {total_production_first_year}-{reduction_amount} = <<{total_production_first_year}-{reduction_amount}={total_production_second_year}>>{total_production_second_year}.
